ProjectTitle: Molecular characterization of rare lymphomas to uncover new biomarkers and treatment targets.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/04/2024
Ethics: please check the S number that you now mention, this normally consists of 5 numbers. 
Sharing: for human data you can consider using EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) where data is kept under restricted access with standardized access request procedures via the KU/UZ Leuven data access committee: https://www.uzleuven.be/nl/dac. When you publish a dataset don't forget to register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (and in the future in the FWO report) see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
